column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I did not try the pepperoni pizza
column2: so I will comment just on mine
column3: the Lou. It had a good taste and mouth feel
column4: and I liked the spinach/garlic/cheese blend. What I didnt love though
column5: was that it did not remind of me of real deep dish pizza. And I know that Lou Malnati's is not necessarily known for the deepest dish
column6: but I was disappointed in the deepness of the individual pizza. We saw several smalls and mediums come out that looked much deeper. To be fair
column7: the server did recommend a small instead of the 2 individuals. He said you get the same amount of pizza
column9: but since we had such different topping interests
